JOB DESCRIPTION:
Skills required: 



Experience in application development using C# / VB.NET, ASP.NET 2.0/ 3.5/4.0

Experience with Web Services, WCF Services and XML, IIS 6 or 7

Hands on experience in JQuery, Javascript, AJAX, CSS, HTML

SQL Server ( TSQL, stored procedures, etc )

OO design and programming, knowledge of UML is added advantage.

Excellent interpersonal and communication skills

Ability to adapt and pick up new techniques and technology

Must be thorough and precise in their work

Ability to work individually or in a team to beat tight deadlines

Knowledge of international web standards and protocols



Responsibilities:



Design, maintain and implement web-based software applications

Development based on the client requirements.

Define and estimate technical solutions, document technical approach options and recommendations.

Understanding of the Software Development Lifecycle.

Provide technical leadership and support to other Decision Support team members
